rows.label: qst200809_msg0002
rows.name: What's wrong, young man?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0003
rows.name:
Why are you looking at our
work with such sad eyes?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0004
rows.name: ...Why don't people cherish nature?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't they understand that they
are also a part of nature?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0006
rows.name: ...Do you like trees, young man?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0007
rows.name:
Yes. Trees and flowers...
Plants are my friends.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0008
rows.name: Friends, huh... You're a kind child.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0009
rows.name:
Hey, young man, we are by
no means wasting nature.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0010
rows.name: Huh? ...But...

rows.label: qst200809_msg0011
rows.name:
It's true that we live by taking
the lives of trees and plants.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0012
rows.name:
Because if we don't...
people can't survive.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0013
rows.name:
But that's precisely why we are more
thankful to trees and plants than anyone,
and we try to handle them with care.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0014
rows.name:
At this lumberyard, we don't even
throw away a splinter of wood; we
process it skillfully and use it.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0015
rows.name: ...I see.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm sure you all will make a
fine splint for me, right...?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0017
rows.name: What, you needed a splint?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0018
rows.name: Yes, I need it to help a friend.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0019
rows.name:
I see. Then I'll prepare
the best splint for you.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0020
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0021
rows.name:
Yeah, really. But for that,
you'll have to gather some
Healing Teak first.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0022
rows.name: Yes!
